title: Topic 001 Question 177
body: You are creating an application that will run on Google Kubernetes Engine. You have identified MongoDB as the most suitable database system for your application and want to deploy a managed MongoDB environment that provides a support SLA. What should you do?
options: Create a Cloud Bigtable cluster, and use the HBase API.
Deploy MongoDB Atlas from the Google Cloud Marketplace.
Download a MongoDB installation package, and run it on Compute Engine instances.
Download a MongoDB installation package, and run it on a Managed Instance Group.
